name: Cards To End Humanity
description:
*Full-screen strongly recommended*
**Refresh the Itch page between attempts to mitigate bugs**

Thank you to everyone who takes the time to play.

Wield the forces of evil in a deck-building card game where your mission is to destroy humanity!

Controls: Mouse

Detailed information about rules can be found within the tutorial section.

*Known Issues (to be fixed post-jam):

  •  Sometimes when picking a modifier card in the choose menu screen the game locks
  • Sometimes when starting a new run after winning/losing a run will lock the game

Created for Jame-Gam 26
Theme: You are the monster
Special Object: Cards

Credits (Detailed credits in game):

Programming and design: billbobphil
Art: billbobphil & opengameart.org
Music: AIVA
Gameplay Testers: HiddenBias

Code for this project can be found here: https://github.com/billbobphil/Jame-Gam-26__You-are-the-monster
